Your unique code
{{lead.SGN Chivas Giveaway Unique Code}}
You will be contacted by Mr. Gentleman within a week from email notification to arrange for an appointment. Please present this email and I/C upon redemption.
Terms and Conditions:
Prize is valid strictly for "Everyday Collection", not exchangeable for cash or other packages. Mr Gentleman (Singapore) will provide up to 2 fitting sessions in which alterations or adjustments will be free of charge. Alterations or adjustments from the 3rd fitting sessions onwards will be chargeable. Time to delivery from measuring to the first fitting session will be 4 weeks. Period does not include time required for alteration after first fitting and alteration time will be varied according to scale of the adjustments. Prize is to be redeemed in person within 6 months from 31 May 2016. Any unredeemed prizes will be forfeited after 30 Nov 2016.
